dialogue.speaker: c2686a11-67f9-4ca3-aa8f-0524ecd562a1
dialogue.subtitleText: With the season rapidly approaching, it'll be interesting to see who, if anyone, really establishes themselves as a racer to watch.

dialogue.speaker: c2686a11-67f9-4ca3-aa8f-0524ecd562a1
dialogue.subtitleText: With Kale Sonora's qualifier win at Issigon last week, everyone's asking if any of today's competition will knock her out of the top slot.

dialogue.speaker: c2686a11-67f9-4ca3-aa8f-0524ecd562a1
dialogue.subtitleText: Couldn't argue for better conditions to race in, I suppose. Call me old-fashioned, but I follow the Waylon Vickers mantra: "I love it when the weather's an opponent."

dialogue.speaker: c2686a11-67f9-4ca3-aa8f-0524ecd562a1
dialogue.subtitleText: New Horizon is really proving itself to be a thinking man's racetrack.

dialogue.speaker: c2686a11-67f9-4ca3-aa8f-0524ecd562a1
dialogue.subtitleText: My understanding is that Consolidate Outlands owner, Silas Koerner, is enjoying the race today from his luxury box. Let me just say, Silas, if you are on the market for a new best friend, I am available.

dialogue.speaker: c2686a11-67f9-4ca3-aa8f-0524ecd562a1
dialogue.subtitleText: The MCRs recently implemented enhanced saftey protocals are on full display. Sure it makes the race a little less exciting, but I guess some people would argue that's worth the price of saving some lives. Not me persay, but some people.
